# Electrode metadata element schema

**Description:** Electrode metadata element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

## Electrode Identifier

**Label:** electrodeID

**Description:** Unique identifier for the electrode, to match and be referenced in channel description.

**Required:** Yes

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/identifier) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
  },
  "type": "object",
  "title": "electrodeID field schema",
  "description": "electrodeID field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "textfield"
  },
  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": true
  },
  "properties": {
    "@type": {
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        {
          "type": "array",
          "minItems": 1,
          "items": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          "uniqueItems": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "@value": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    },
    "rdfs:label": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "@value"
  ],
  "schema:name": "electrodeID",
  "schema:description": "Unique identifier for the electrode, to match and be referenced in channel description.",
  "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T08:13:34-07:00",
  "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
```

## Electrode Hemisphere

**Label:** electrodeHemisphere

**Description:** Brain hemisphere where the electrode was located.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0001025) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",

    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
```

## Electrode Location

**Label:** electrodeLocation

**Description:** Textual indication of the location of the electrode (e.g. cortical layer 3, ca1, etc)

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0001025) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
```

## Electrode X position

**Label:** electrodeX

**Description:** Recorded position along the local x-axis relative to the probe origin and rotation.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** numeric

**Unit of Measure:** mm

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000404) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>


## Electrode Y position

**Label:** electrodeY

**Description:** Recorded position along the local y-axis relative to the probe origin and rotation.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** numeric

**Unit of Measure:** mm

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000406) <details>

## Electrode Impedance

**Label:** electrodeImpedance

**Description:** Impedance of the electrode or pipette (pipette_resistance). This can be a single value or a list of two values indicating a value range.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/galen#hasImpedance) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "type": "array",
  "minItems": 1,
  "items": {
    "type": "object",
    "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
    "@context": {
      "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
      "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
      "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
      "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
      "schema": "http://schema.org/",
      "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
      "schema:name": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "schema:description": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:prefLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:altLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "pav:createdOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "pav:createdBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      },
      "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "oslc:modifiedBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      }
    },
    "title": "electrodeImpedance field schema",
    "description": "electrodeImpedance field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
    "_ui": {
      "inputType": "numeric"
    },
    "_valueConstraints": {
      "requiredValue": false,
      "numberType": "xsd:decimal",
      "unitOfMeasure": "ohms"
    },
    "properties": {
      "@value": {
        "type": [
          "string",
          "null"
        ]
      },
      "rdfs:label": {
        "type": [
          "string",
          "null"
        ]
      },
      "@type": {
        "type": "string",
        "format": "uri"
      }
    },
    "required": [
      "@value",
      "@type"
    ],
    "additionalProperties": false,
    "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T08:13:34-07:00",

    "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
    "schema:name": "electrodeImpedance",
    "schema:description": "Impedance of the electrode or pipette (pipette_resistance). This can be a single value or a list of two values indicating a value range.",
    "skos:prefLabel": "Electrode Impedance",
    "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/cab82a03-3d17-41af-8110-daaf711e347b",
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
  }
}
```
</details>

## Electrode Shank Identifier

**Label:** electrodeShankID

**Description:** Identifier to specify which shank of the probe the electrode is present. Alternatively, electrode probe identifier could be used here.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/identifier) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
```
